item.title: Index Mapping
item.description: When indexing documents from MongoDB into elasticsearch the default mapping is as follows: mongodb database name . mongodb collection name -> elasticsearch index name mongodb collection name -> elasticsearch type mongodb document _id -> elasticsearch document _id If these default won’t work for some reason you can override the index and type mapping on a per collection basis by adding the following to your TOML config file: [[mapping]] namespace = "test.
